how are you?

Fine, thanks. What do you got for me today?

responses: See you, Have a nice day :)

patterns: Not all messages or some of them are not consumed by MegaBroker; the user is aware of the total number of messages supposed to be valid under MegaBroker which does not match with the total valid FlowIn number found?
Bellows possible solutions for the problems according to different channels type?
Flows Not consumed
responses:
Check that the queue manager is up How to check the queue manager is up ?
Check if the maximum connection pool is reached (as a workaround restart the queue manager and create a Jira ticket to investigate the issue)
Check that the queue is not stuck How to check the queue is not stuck?
Check that there is a free space disk available under middleware machine
Check that the device is active How to check the device is active?
Check the queue connectivity How to to check connectivity ?
Check the queue configuration; the channel name, connection factory, etc under MegaBroker correspond to those in the queue manager How to check device configuration?
Check the refresh time; make sure that messages are not consumed even after the lapse of time How to check the refresh time ?
Check that the folder path exists under the VM How to check the file device?
Check that the folder contains unconsumed messages
Check that the user have all rights (read/write) on the folder
Check that there is a free space disk
Check the file device connectivity How to check the device connectivity?
Check the file device configuration (folder path, file extension, etc.) How to check device configuration?
Check that folder path exists under sftp server
Check if maximum connection pool is reached
Check the disk size,
Check the device is active How to check the device is active?,
Check sftp device connectivity How to check the device connectivity?
Check sftp configuration (folder path, file extension, port, etc.) How to check device configuration?

intents.tag: Case of FlowIn are stuck in status Received
patterns: All messages are consumed but are not valid under MegaBroker; the flows are not under status Valid Flow ?
Please refer to the adequate solution according to the following cases ?
Case of FlowIn are stuck in status Received
responses:
Wait some minutes and refresh
Check the database, the user have to ensure it's not full or not locked, if flows are under the same status after a while.
Restart MegaBroker application, 'Ignore' the flowIn and click on 'Replay' How to replay Flow ?
Create a Jira ticket and provide log

intents.tag: Case of FlowIn are stuck in status 'Identification Failed'
patterns: All messages are consumed but are not valid under MegaBroker; the flows are not under status Valid Flow ?
Please refer to the adequate solution according to the following cases ?
Case of FlowIn are stuck in status 'Identification Failed'
responses:
Check the preparsing field of the adequate flow in configuration How to check the preparsing Field?
Check devices properties under the Flow in configuration. The flow file name or class name and extension should be same as mentioned in the flow In configuration How to check device properties?

intents.tag: Case of FlowIn are stuck in status 'In process' or 'Record Created
patterns: All messages are consumed but are not valid under MegaBroker; the flows are not under status Valid Flow ?
Please refer to the adequate solution according to the following cases ?
Case of FlowIn are stuck in status 'In process' or 'Record Created'
responses: Create a Jira ticket and provide logs file

intents.tag: Case of FlowIn are stuck in status 'Parsing and mapping failed'
patterns: All messages are consumed but are not valid under MegaBroker; the flows are not under status Valid Flow ?
Please refer to the adequate solution according to the following cases ?
Case of FlowIn are stuck in status 'Parsing and mapping failed'
responses:
Try the parse the message (flow in) via screen message parser  How to parse the message?
Parse the message using the source value of the default record (the user can refer to How to parse the message? and have to fill the mapping ID)

intents.tag: Case of FlowIn are stuck in status 'Flow with Errors'
patterns: All messages are consumed but are not valid under MegaBroker; the flows are not under status Valid Flow ?
Please refer to the adequate solution according to the following cases ?
Case of FlowIn are stuck in status 'Flow with Errors'
responses:
Check the flowIn content. Generally, this issue affects the process with split; not all messages out are generated successfully
 Create a Jira ticket and provide logs

patterns: MegaBroker does not generate messages out or they are not under status 'Sent' (Flow out not sent to the destination)
Please refer to the adequate solution according to the following cases
Case of Flow out stuck in status 'Created'
responses:
Create a Jira ticket and provide logs file
 As a workaround process it manually (this could be due to performance issue )

intents.tag: Case of Flow out stuck in status 'Message Created'
patterns: MegaBroker does not generate messages out or they are not under status 'Sent' (Flow out not sent to the destination)
Please refer to the adequate solution according to the following cases
Case of Flow out stuck in status 'Message Created'
responses:
Check the cut off configuration How to check the Cut Off configuration?
 As a workaround send it manually (this could be due to performance issue )

intents.tag: Case of Flow out stuck in status 'Generation Failed'
patterns: MegaBroker does not generate messages out or they are not under status 'Sent' (Flow out not sent to the destination)
Please refer to the adequate solution according to the following cases
Case of Flow out stuck in status 'Message Created'
responses: Create a Jira ticket and provide logs file

intents.tag: Case of Flow out stuck in status Waiting Ack
patterns: MegaBroker does not generate messages out or they are not under status 'Sent' (Flow out not sent to the destination)
Please refer to the adequate solution according to the following cases
Case of Flow out stuck in status Waiting Ack
responses:
Check the swift machine configuration
Check the ack configuration
Ping the swift machine to check the connection
As a workaround Manual Ack the flow
